Summary: The object we observered was coming north from hillandale shopping center when first observed
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Silver Spring
There were no other sightings in Silver Spring on or around July 1st 2013
divs: Sighting Detailswe were traveling out of the shell gas station near hillandale shopping center when my passenger observed an object flying somewhat above the buildings with erratic lights I could not see anything as I was driving she exclaimed I need to pull over to see the object I pulled over into a parking lot of a church the parking lot was empty and quite a nice size lot I the put down the top as we were in a convertible I then observed the lights blinking about the object and thought it could be a plane but as the object got closer it started to pass over the lot almost above our heads I thought it could be an ufo since it was so close to the ground and had no sound.we began to grow quiet when I started to flash my lights at the object my girlfriend was telling me not to and tried to restart the car but couldn't but I wanted to signal the ufo and then something strange happened as it started to occur to me just how close the object actually was it turned off its light?and then began flying without running lights? Now im not sure about airplanes but I do know that its illegal for boats to run without running lights so? the next thing that happened was we watched it as it dark cylindrical shape floated away
